p: The effect of methanol extract as well as the partitioned extracts of the stembark of L. sericeus on xylene-induced ear oedema in mice ear, as shown in Table 4, indicated that the extracts also inhibited (p<0.001) oedema caused by the topical administration of xylene at all dose regimes, when compared to distilled water in a way similar to the prototype drug, dexamethasone.
